actions.action: Click filter or view options to show archived expenses
Locate the archived expense with amount "amount_updated123456"
actions.expectedResult: Archived expense is visible in filtered view

actions.action: Click "Restore" button or action for the archived expense
Click "Yes" or "Confirm" in the restoration dialog
Verify alert message "Successfully restored expense" appears
Verify restored expense appears in active list
actions.expectedResult: Expense is back in main listing
